project: AI-Driven Personalized Carbon Footprint Reduction Challenge & Community Engagement Workflow

stages.name: User Onboarding
stages.description: Collect user data and set up personalized profiles
actions: Survey to gather lifestyle and carbon footprint data
Baseline carbon footprint calculation using AI models

stages.name: Personalized Challenge Generation
stages.description: Generate customized carbon reduction challenges based on user data
actions: AI analyzes user profile and baseline data
Assign difficulty and impact ratings to challenges

stages.name: Community Engagement
stages.description: Foster community interaction to boost motivation and accountability
actions: Create community forums and group challenges
Enable user sharing of progress and tips

stages.name: Progress Tracking and Feedback
stages.description: Monitor challenge completion and provide feedback for habit formation
actions: Track challenge completion via app inputs and IoT data integration
Provide AI-generated feedback and tips for improvement
Adjust future challenges based on performance

technologies: Mobile and Web applications for data collection and interaction
IoT integration for real-time data tracking
goals: Build a supportive community around sustainability
Leverage AI to tailor challenges and feedback
